article_title: Photos: Preparing for Son's Pre-K Debut
article_text:
Luke Winters shows off his suit that he plans to wear on his first day at school, while his 8-year-old sister Penelope stands by amused. Julie Platner for The Wall Street Journal …

Tracy Shupp and Brad Winters on kitchen duty while their 10-year-old daughter Ruby writes at the table. Julie Platner for The Wall Street Journal …

On the way to P.S. 58, the Carroll School, in the Carroll Gardens neighborhood of Brooklyn. Julie Platner for The Wall Street Journal …

Luke, Ms. Shupp with teacher Bethany Hatheway. Julie Platner for The Wall Street Journal …

A welcome sign on the classroom door. Julie Platner for The Wall Street Journal …

twitter.description: Four-year-old Luke Winters joins other schoolchildren embarking on a rite of passage across New York City.
twitter.title: Photos: Preparing for Son's Pre-K Debut

image.alt: See a slideshow of how one NYC family got son ready for prekindergarten.
